name: RadioMenuButton
desc: A menu item that combines a [Radio] widget with a [MenuItemButton].

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value represented by this radio button.

fields.name: groupValue
fields.desc: The currently selected value for a group of radio buttons.

fields.name: toggleable
fields.desc: Set to true if this radio button is allowed to be returned to an indeterminate state by selecting it again when selected.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user selects this radio button.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer enters or exits the button response area.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: shortcut
fields.desc: The optional shortcut that selects this [MenuItemButton].

fields.name: trailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display after the [child] label.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget displayed in the center of this button.
